trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Remove-Item
trans-unit.target: Remove-Item

trans-unit.source: Remove-Item
trans-unit.target: Remove-Item

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Deletes the specified items.
trans-unit.target: 刪除指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: Path (Default)
trans-unit.target: 路徑 （預設值）

trans-unit.source: LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: 常值路徑

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The Remove-Item cmdlet deletes one or more items.
trans-unit.target: Remove-Item Cmdlet 會刪除一或多個項目。

trans-unit.source: Because it is supported by many providers, it can delete many different types of items, including files, directories, registry keys, variables, aliases, and functions.
trans-unit.target: 因為有許多提供者支援，故它能刪除許多不同類型的項目，包括檔案、目錄、登錄機碼、變數、別名及函式。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: This command deletes all of the files with names that include a dot (.) from the C:\Test directory.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會將 C:\Test 目錄中檔案名稱包含點 (.) 的所有檔案刪除。

trans-unit.source: Because the command specifies a dot, the command does not delete directories or files with no file name extension.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會指定一個點，因此，此命令不會刪除沒有副檔名的目錄或檔案。

trans-unit.source: This command deletes from the current directory all files with a .doc file name extension and a name that does not include "1".
trans-unit.target: 此命令會從目前的目錄中刪除副檔名為 .doc 且名稱未包含 "1" 的所有檔案。

trans-unit.source: It uses the wildcard character (*) to specify the contents of the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用萬用字元 (*) 指定目前目錄的內容。

trans-unit.source: It uses the Include and Exclude parameters to specify the files to delete.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用 Include 和 Exclude 參數指定要刪除的檔案。

trans-unit.source: This command deletes a file that is both hidden and read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會刪除隱藏和唯讀的檔案。

trans-unit.source: It uses the Path parameter to specify the file.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用 Path 參數指定檔案。

trans-unit.source: It uses the Force parameter to give permission to delete it.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用 Force 參數來授與將它刪除的權限。

trans-unit.source: Without Force, you cannot delete read-only or hidden files.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有 Force，則無法刪除唯讀或隱藏的檔案。

trans-unit.source: This command deletes all of the CSV files in the current directory and all subdirectories recursively.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會循環刪除目前目錄和所有子目錄中的所有 CSV 檔案。

trans-unit.source: Because the Recurse parameter in the Remove-Item cmdlet has a known issue (it might not delete all child directories or files, especially if the Include parameter is added to the command), the command in this example uses the Get-ChildItem cmdlet to get the desired files, and then uses the pipeline operator to pass them to the Remove-Item cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 因為 Remove-Item Cmdlet 中的 Recurse 參數有已知問題 (它可能不會刪除所有子目錄或檔案，尤其是命令中加入 Include 參數時)，此範例中的命令會使用 Get-ChildItem Cmdlet 來取得所需的檔案，然後使用管線運算子將它們傳送至 Remove-Item Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: In the Get-ChildItem command, the Path parameter has a value of *, which represents the contents of the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 在 Get-ChildItem 命令中，Path 參數有一個值 *，代表目前目錄的內容。

trans-unit.source: It uses the Include parameter to specify the CSV file type, and it uses the Recurse parameter to make the retrieval recursive.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用 Include 參數指定 CSV 檔案類型，並使用 Recurse 參數循環擷取。

trans-unit.source: If you try to specify the file type in the path, such as "-path *.csv", the cmdlet interprets the subject of the search to be a file that has no child items, and Recurse fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試在路徑中指定檔案類型，例如 "-path *.csv"，Cmdlet 會將搜尋主體解譯為沒有子項目的檔案，Recurse 就會失敗。

trans-unit.source: This command deletes the OldApp registry key and all of its subkeys and values.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會刪除 OldApp 登錄機碼及其所有的子機碼與值。

trans-unit.source: It uses the Remove-Item cmdlet to remove the key.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用 Remove-Item Cmdlet 移除機碼。

trans-unit.source: The path is specified, but the optional parameter name (Path) is omitted.
trans-unit.target: 會指定路徑，但會省略選擇性參數名稱 (Path)。

trans-unit.source: The Recurse parameter deletes all of the contents of the OldApp key recursively.
trans-unit.target: Recurse 參數會循環刪除 OldApp 機碼的所有內容。

trans-unit.source: If the key contains subkeys and you omit the Recurse parameter, you are prompted to confirm that you want to delete the contents of the key.
trans-unit.target: 如果機碼包含子機碼，而且省略 Recurse 參數，系統會提示您確認是否要刪除機碼內容。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -Credential
trans-unit.target: -Credential

trans-unit.source: Specifies a user account that has permission to perform this action.
trans-unit.target: 指定具有執行此動作權限的使用者帳戶。

trans-unit.source: The default is the current user.
trans-unit.target: 預設為目前使用者。

trans-unit.source: Type a user name, such as "User01" or "Domain01\User01", or enter a PSCredential object, such as one generated by the Get-Credential cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 輸入使用者名稱，例如 "User01" 或 "Domain01\User01"，或輸入 PSCredential 物件，例如 Get-Credential Cmdlet 產生的物件。

trans-unit.source: If you type a user name, you will be prompted for a password.
trans-unit.target: 若您輸入使用者名稱，將會提示您輸入密碼。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not supported by any providers installed with Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 與 Windows PowerShell 一起安裝的任何提供者皆不支援此參數。

trans-unit.source: -Exclude
trans-unit.target: -排除

trans-unit.source: Omits the specified items.
trans-unit.target: 省略指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the Path parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此參數的值會限定 Path 參數。

trans-unit.source: Enter a path element or pattern, such as "*.txt".
trans-unit.target: 輸入路徑元素或模式，例如 "*.txt"。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: -Filter
trans-unit.target: 篩選器

trans-unit.source: Specifies a filter in the provider's format or language.
trans-unit.target: 以提供者的格式或語言指定篩選。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the Path parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此參數的值會限定 Path 參數。

trans-unit.source: The syntax of the filter, including the use of wildcards, depends on the provider.
trans-unit.target: 篩選的語法 (包括是否使用萬用字元) 取決於提供者。

trans-unit.source: Filters are more efficient than other parameters, because the provider applies them when retrieving the objects, rather than having Windows PowerShell filter the objects after they are retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 篩選比其他參數更有效率，因為提供者會在抓取物件時套用篩選，而不是讓 Windows PowerShell 抓取物件後篩選。

trans-unit.source: -Force
trans-unit.target: -Force

trans-unit.source: Allows the cmdlet to remove items that cannot otherwise be changed, such as hidden or read-only files or read-only aliases or variables.
trans-unit.target: 允許 Cmdlet 移除無法變更的項目，例如隱藏或唯讀的檔案，或是唯讀的別名或變數。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet cannot remove constant aliases or variables.
trans-unit.target: Cmdlet 無法移除常數別名或變數。

trans-unit.source: Implementation varies from provider to provider.
trans-unit.target: 實作會依提供者而異。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Providers.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Providers。

trans-unit.source: Even using the Force parameter, the cmdlet cannot override security restrictions.
trans-unit.target: 即使使用 Force 參數，Cmdlet 仍然無法覆寫安全性限制。

trans-unit.source: -Include
trans-unit.target: -Include

trans-unit.source: Deletes only the specified items.
trans-unit.target: 只刪除指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the Path parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此參數的值會限定 Path 參數。

trans-unit.source: Enter a path element or pattern, such as "*.txt".
trans-unit.target: 輸入路徑元素或模式，例如 "*.txt"。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: -LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: -LiteralPath

trans-unit.source: Specifies a path to the items being removed.
trans-unit.target: 指定要移除之項目的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Unlike Path, the value of LiteralPath is used exactly as it is typed.
trans-unit.target: 與 Path 不同，LiteralPath 將完全依照其輸入值來使用。

trans-unit.source: No characters are interpreted as wildcards.
trans-unit.target: 沒有字元會被視為萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: If the path includes escape characters, enclose it in single quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果路徑包含逸出字元，請將它括在單引號中。

trans-unit.source: Single quotation marks tell Windows PowerShell not to interpret any characters as escape sequences.
trans-unit.target: 單引號告知 Windows PowerShell 不要將任何字元視為逸出序列。

trans-unit.source: -Path
trans-unit.target: -Path

trans-unit.source: Specifies a path to the items being removed.
trans-unit.target: 指定要移除之項目的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: The parameter name ("-Path") is optional.
trans-unit.target: 參數名稱 ("-Path") 為選擇性。

trans-unit.source: -Recurse
trans-unit.target: -Recurse

trans-unit.source: Deletes the items in the specified locations and in all child items of the locations.
trans-unit.target: 刪除指定位置中之項目和那些位置的所有子項目中的項目。

trans-unit.source: When it is used with the Include parameter, the Recurse parameter might not delete all child directories or all child items.
trans-unit.target: 搭配 Include 參數使用時，Recurse 參數可能不會刪除所有子目錄或所有子項目。

trans-unit.source: This is a known issue; as a workaround, try piping results of the Get-ChildItem -Recurse cmdlet into the Remove-Item cmdlet, as described in Example 4 in this topic.
trans-unit.target: 這是已知的問題，請嘗試使用管線將 Get-ChildItem -Recurse Cmdlet 的結果傳送至 Remove-Item Cmdlet 來解決，如本主題中的範例 4 中所述。

trans-unit.source: -Confirm
trans-unit.target: -Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 顯示執行 Cmdlet 後會發生的情況。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行此指令程式。顯示執行此指令程式會發生什麼事。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
trans-unit.target: 未執行 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: -UseTransaction
trans-unit.target: -UseTransaction

trans-unit.source: Includes the command in the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 將命令加入使用中交易。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 只有交易為處理中狀態時，此參數才有效。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Includes the command in the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱包含使用中交易中的命令。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 只有交易為處理中狀態時，此參數才有效。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱本主題中的

trans-unit.source: -Stream
trans-unit.target: 資料流

trans-unit.source: {{Fill Stream Description}}
trans-unit.target: {{填滿資料流描述}}

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: System.String
trans-unit.target: System.String

trans-unit.source: You can pipe a string that contains a path (but not a literal path) to Remove-Item.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用管線將包含路徑的字串 (而非常值路徑) 傳送至 Remove-Item。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not return any output.
trans-unit.target: 此 Cmdlet 不會傳回任何輸出。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: You can also refer to Remove-Item by any of its built-in aliases, "del", "erase", "rmdir", "rd", "ri", or "rm".
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用 Remove-Item 內建的任一別名 ("del"、"erase"、"rmdir"、"rd"、"ri" 或 "rm") 來參照它。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Aliases.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Aliases。

trans-unit.source: The Remove-Item cmdlet is designed to work with the data exposed by any provider.
trans-unit.target: Remove-Item Cmdlet 是針對與任何提供者公開的資料搭配使用所設計。

trans-unit.source: To list the providers available in your session, type "Get-PsProvider".
trans-unit.target: 若要列出工作階段中可用的提供者，請輸入 "Get-PsProvider"。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Providers.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Providers。

trans-unit.target: 相關的連結
